mapper.update:
update prize_d set
prize_id=#{prizeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prize_type=#{prizeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
integral_qty=#{integralQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prob=#{prob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
eticket_code=#{eticketCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_change=#{isChange,jdbcType=TINYINT},

prize_name=#{prizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete= #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 0

mapper.select: select id from prize_d where activity_id=#{condition.activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and prize_type=#{condition.prizeType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and eticket_code = #{condition.eticketCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
